functions.name: mod_assign_copy_previous_attempt

assignmentid.desc: The assignment id to operate on

warningcode.desc: the warning code can be used by the client app to implement specific behaviour

message.desc: untranslated english message to explain the warning

functions.name: mod_assign_get_assignments

content.desc: course id, empty for retrieving all the courses where the user is enroled in

capabilities.desc: list of capabilities used to filter courses

includenotenrolledcourses.desc:
whether to return courses that the user can see
                                                                    even if is not enroled in. This requires the parameter courseids
                                                                    to not be empty.

completionsubmit.desc: if enabled, set activity as complete following submission

cutoffdate.desc: date after which submission is not accepted without an extension

gradingduedate.desc: the expected date for marking the submissions

teamsubmission.desc: if enabled, students submit as a team

requireallteammemberssubmit.desc: if enabled, all team members must submit

teamsubmissiongroupingid.desc: the grouping id for the team submission groups

blindmarking.desc: if enabled, hide identities until reveal identities actioned

hidegrader.desc: If enabled, hide grader to student

revealidentities.desc: show identities for a blind marking assignment

attemptreopenmethod.desc: method used to control opening new attempts

submissionstatementformat.desc: submissionstatement format (1 = HTML, 0 = MOODLE, 2 = PLAIN or 4 = MARKDOWN)

intro.desc: assignment intro, not allways returned because it deppends on the activity configuration

introformat.desc: intro format (1 = HTML, 0 = MOODLE, 2 = PLAIN or 4 = MARKDOWN)

repositorytype.desc: The repository type for external files.
The repository type for external files.

itemid.desc: When item is a course then itemid is a course id. When the item is a module then itemid is a module id

warningcode.desc: errorcode can be 1 (no access rights) or 2 (not enrolled or no permissions)

message.desc: untranslated english message to explain the warning

functions.description: Returns the courses and assignments for the users capability

functions.name: mod_assign_get_grades

since.desc: timestamp, only return records where timemodified >= since

gradefordisplay.desc: grade rendered into a format suitable for display

itemid.desc: when errorcode is 3 then itemid is an assignment id. When errorcode is 1, itemid is a course module id

warningcode.desc: errorcode can be 3 (no grades found) or 1 (no permission to get grades)

message.desc: untranslated english message to explain the warning

functions.description: Returns grades from the assignment

functions.name: mod_assign_get_participant

requiregrading.desc: is their submission waiting for grading

grantedextension.desc: have they been granted an extension

blindmarking.desc: is blind marking enabled for this assignment

groupid.desc: for group assignments this is the group id

groupname.desc: for group assignments this is the group name

firstname.desc: The first name(s) of the user

lastname.desc: The family name of the user

email.desc: An email address - allow email as root@localhost

idnumber.desc: An arbitrary ID code number perhaps from the institution

firstaccess.desc: first access to the site (0 if never)

lastaccess.desc: last access to the site (0 if never)

auth.desc: Auth plugins include manual, ldap, etc

suspended.desc: Suspend user account, either false to enable user login or true to disable it

lang.desc: Language code such as "en", must exist on server

calendartype.desc: Calendar type such as "gregorian", must exist on server

theme.desc: Theme name such as "standard", must exist on server

timezone.desc: Timezone code such as Australia/Perth, or 99 for default

mailformat.desc: Mail format code is 0 for plain text, 1 for HTML etc

descriptionformat.desc: int format (1 = HTML, 0 = MOODLE, 2 = PLAIN or 4 = MARKDOWN)

country.desc: Home country code of the user, such as AU or CZ

profileimageurlsmall.desc: User image profile URL - small version

profileimageurl.desc: User image profile URL - big version

type.desc: The type of the custom field - text field, checkbox...

value.desc: The value of the custom field

name.desc: The name of the custom field

shortname.desc: The shortname of the custom field - to be able to build the field class in the code

customfields.desc: User custom fields (also known as user profile fields)

groupid.desc:
filter by users in group (used for generating the grading summary).
                    Empty or 0 for all groups information.

participantcount.desc: Number of users who can submit.

submissiondraftscount.desc: Number of submissions in draft status.

submissionsenabled.desc: Whether submissions are enabled or not.

submissionssubmittedcount.desc: Number of submissions in submitted status.

submissionsneedgradingcount.desc: Number of submissions that need grading.

warnofungroupedusers.desc:
Whether we need to warn people that there
                                                                        are users without groups ('warningrequired'), warn
                                                                        people there are users who will submit in the default
                                                                        group ('warningoptional') or no warning ('').
